Hasan suggested a lack of respect for other religions contributed to the disaster, while the BJP condemned his remarks as insulting to Sanatan Dharma amidst a natural calamity.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/they-label-kanwariyas-as-terrorists-bjp-calls-samajwadi-party-communal-slams-ex-mp-st-hasan-over-uttarkashi-flood-remark/articleshow/123203883.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/they-label-kanwariyas-as-terrorists-bjp-calls-samajwadi-party-communal-slams-ex-mp-st-hasan-over-uttarkashi-flood-remark/articleshow/123203883.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 15:35:04 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1116539" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123203934,imgsize-1116539.cms"/></item><item><title>WTC Table: How the standings look as NZ crush Zim – Where does India stand?</title><description><![CDATA[New Zealand's massive innings victory over Zimbabwe in Bulawayo, though impressive, doesn't affect the current ICC World Test Championship standings as Zimbabwe isn't part of the cycle. India currently holds third place, while Australia leads the table.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/updated-wtc-points-table-how-the-standings-look-as-new-zealand-crush-zimbabwe-where-does-india-stand/articleshow/123205771.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/updated-wtc-points-table-how-the-standings-look-as-new-zealand-crush-zimbabwe-where-does-india-stand/articleshow/123205771.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 18:28:24 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1323936" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123205849,imgsize-1323936.cms"/></item><item><title>Nvidia CEO visits White House to seek licenses for 'designed-for China' AI chips</title><description><![CDATA[Nvidia's CEO, Jensen Huang, reportedly lobbied President Trump, leading to the US Commerce Department issuing licenses for H20 AI chips designed for China, reversing an earlier stricter stance. Security officials are concerned about potential military strengthening in China, while Nvidia argues restrictions hinder US competitiveness and boost domestic Chinese alternatives like Huawei.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/nvidia-ceo-visits-white-house-to-seek-licenses-for-designed-for-china-ai-chips-heres-what-made-him-personally-lobby-with-donald-trump/articleshow/123203385.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/nvidia-ceo-visits-white-house-to-seek-licenses-for-designed-for-china-ai-chips-heres-what-made-him-personally-lobby-with-donald-trump/articleshow/123203385.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 14:42:24 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="52102" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123203378,imgsize-52102.cms"/></item><item><title>US-India trade war: What triggered Trump's tariff attack on India - key reasons</title><description><![CDATA[Donald Trump's administration has escalated trade tensions with India, imposing tariffs due to energy ties with Russia and stalled trade negotiations. This move, coupled with disagreements over diplomatic interventions and strategic alignments, has strained US-India relations. India is cautiously navigating this complex situation, balancing economic interests with its commitment to strategic autonomy and an independent foreign policy.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/us-india-trade-war-what-triggered-donald-trumps-tariff-attack-on-india-over-russian-oil-key-reasons/articleshow/123145277.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/us-india-trade-war-what-triggered-donald-trumps-tariff-attack-on-india-over-russian-oil-key-reasons/articleshow/123145277.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 10:00:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>AYUSH PANDEY</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="46728" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123146217,imgsize-46728.cms"/></item><item><title>Heavy rains in Delhi: Wall collapse in Hari Nagar kills 8</title><description><![CDATA[In Hari Nagar, New Delhi, a devastating wall collapse triggered by heavy overnight rainfall resulted in the tragic deaths of at least eight people. The collapse damaged nearby shanties located near an old temple, prompting immediate rescue operations by the Delhi Fire Services. Authorities have evacuated residents from adjacent shanties to prevent further incidents following the collapse.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/wall-collapses-in-delhis-harinagar-fire-tenders-on-spot/articleshow/123200585.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/wall-collapses-in-delhis-harinagar-fire-tenders-on-spot/articleshow/123200585.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 10:13:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="49074" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123203333,imgsize-49074.cms"/></item><item><title>England cricket legend Pietersen reveals ‘best Test series ever played’</title><description><![CDATA[Kevin Pietersen's declaration immortalises the 2005 Ashes as his career highlight and the greatest Test series ever. England's triumph, fueled by Pietersen's explosive century and a resilient team effort, marked a defining moment against a formidable Australian side. The series, filled with narrow victories and dramatic performances, etched itself into cricketing history, showcasing courage and flair.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/england-cricket-legend-kevin-pietersen-reveals-best-test-series-ever-played/articleshow/123205578.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/england-cricket-legend-kevin-pietersen-reveals-best-test-series-ever-played/articleshow/123205578.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 18:24:07 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="92112" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123205743,imgsize-92112.cms"/></item><item><title>Nvidia CEO checks salaries of company's 42,000 employees; says: It's a strategy that…</title><description><![CDATA[Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang personally reviews the compensation of all 42,000 employees monthly, utilizing machine learning to optimize the process. This strategy has significantly benefited Nvidia's leadership, creating billionaires within his management team.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/nvidia-ceo-jensen-huang-checks-salaries-of-companys-entire-42000-employees-says-its-a-strategy-that-/articleshow/123194662.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/nvidia-ceo-jensen-huang-checks-salaries-of-companys-entire-42000-employees-says-its-a-strategy-that-/articleshow/123194662.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 23:44:23 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="43658" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123194569,imgsize-43658.cms"/></item><item><title>'Makes it even more shocking...': Cong questions PM after IAF chief's Op Sindoor revelations</title><description><![CDATA[Following the IAF chief's disclosure about Operation Sindoor, Congress leaders are questioning Prime Minister Modi's decision to halt the operation abruptly on May 10. Chopra suggests roster changes to accommodate Samson at KKR.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/ipl/top-stories/sanju-samson-wishes-to-leave-rajasthan-royals-because-of-14-year-old-vaibhav-suryavanshi/articleshow/123204553.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/ipl/top-stories/sanju-samson-wishes-to-leave-rajasthan-royals-because-of-14-year-old-vaibhav-suryavanshi/articleshow/123204553.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 16:55:59 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="56816" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123204645,imgsize-56816.cms"/></item><item><title>GTA 6 release date set for May 2026: Innovative gameplay promises new thrills</title><description><![CDATA[Grand Theft Auto 6 is slated for a May 26, 2026, release, fueling excitement tempered by Rockstar's history of delays. Emergency services responded swiftly, and an investigation is currently underway to determine the exact cause of the incident.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/1-dead-as-fire-breaks-out-in-delhis-anand-vihar-hospital-11-patients-rescued/articleshow/123203801.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/1-dead-as-fire-breaks-out-in-delhis-anand-vihar-hospital-11-patients-rescued/articleshow/123203801.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 15:45:26 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="39654" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123204011,imgsize-39654.cms"/></item><item><title>ICICI bank raises minimum balance for new customers: Rs 50,000 in cities</title><description><![CDATA[ICICI Bank has raised the minimum average balance requirement for new savings accounts opened from August 1st. Navratilova noted Evert's desire to please her parents influenced her behavior. The remarks added a new layer to their famous rivalry. Their contrasting styles fueled tennis's growth.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/international-sports/more-than-any-american-culture-martina-navratilova-once-shared-how-chris-everts-catholic-upbringing-shaped-her-tennis-image/articleshow/123175846.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/international-sports/more-than-any-american-culture-martina-navratilova-once-shared-how-chris-everts-catholic-upbringing-shaped-her-tennis-image/articleshow/123175846.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 04:33:06 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1369485" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123175824,imgsize-1369485.cms"/></item><item><title>Record! Zimbabwe struggled against New Zealand's pace attack, succumbing to their lowest series total, highlighting the gulf between the two teams.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/record-win-new-zealand-seal-biggest-test-victory-zimbabwe-suffer-worst-ever-defeat/articleshow/123205025.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/record-win-new-zealand-seal-biggest-test-victory-zimbabwe-suffer-worst-ever-defeat/articleshow/123205025.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 17:34:07 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="55952" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123205145,imgsize-55952.cms"/></item><item><title>IAF chief says India shot down 6 Pakistani aircraft; trashes Trump's claim</title><description><![CDATA[Air Chief Marshal Amar Preet Singh revealed that the Indian Air Force (IAF) successfully shot down five Pakistani jets and an AEW&C aircraft during Operation Sindoor. The city recorded significant rainfall, with Safdarjung reporting 78.7 mm.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/drowning-delhi-flooded-roads-stuck-cars-and-soaked-capital-heavy-rains-lash-city/articleshow/123200644.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/drowning-delhi-flooded-roads-stuck-cars-and-soaked-capital-heavy-rains-lash-city/articleshow/123200644.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 10:57:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="3525763" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123201025,imgsize-3525763.cms"/></item><item><title>'Will not give land to occupier': Zelenskyy rules out ceding Ukraine territory to Russia</title><description><![CDATA[As Trump and Putin prepare for a summit in Alaska, Zelenskyy insists that no decisions about Ukraine should be made without Ukraine's involvement. Prasad admitted to slitting his nephew's throat due to his constant demands and arrogant behavior.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bengaluru/security-guard-kills-nephew-in-bengaluru-surrenders-after-4-days/articleshow/123195218.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bengaluru/security-guard-kills-nephew-in-bengaluru-surrenders-after-4-days/articleshow/123195218.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 00:00:35 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="21382" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123199709,imgsize-21382.cms"/></item><item><title>Bazball's revolution: How England's bold era is tilting Test cricket towards the batters</title><description><![CDATA[Since Brendon McCullum's arrival, England's Test cricket has transformed with 'Bazball,' marked by aggressive play and high win rates. Trump anticipates territory swaps as part of any peace agreement.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/eastern-ukraine-in-exchange-for-peace-vladimir-putins-demand-ahead-of-alaska-meeting-with-donald-trump-report/articleshow/123200012.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/eastern-ukraine-in-exchange-for-peace-vladimir-putins-demand-ahead-of-alaska-meeting-with-donald-trump-report/articleshow/123200012.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 10:23:06 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="878749" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123200668,imgsize-878749.cms"/></item><item><title>Railways launches 20% rebate on return tickets to ease Diwali-Chhath festival rush</title><description><![CDATA[To ease Diwali and Chhath rush, railways introduces a 'Round Trip Package' offering a 20% fare rebate on return journeys booked together. Tesla officially entered India last month with the launch of its Model Y, with deliveries expected to begin in the third quarter of 2025.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/arriving-in-delhi-tesla-to-open-second-india-showroom-check-date-and-other-details/articleshow/123201642.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/arriving-in-delhi-tesla-to-open-second-india-showroom-check-date-and-other-details/articleshow/123201642.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 12:04:45 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="71286" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123201714,imgsize-71286.cms"/></item><item><title>Rooting for Joe Root! Can England batter end his wait for a ton Down Under?</title><description><![CDATA[The Test great has left contemporaries trailing in his dust since the pandemic, so much so that only the inimitable Sachin Tendulkar now stands above him. Can the England batter now correct the one gaping hole in his resume, of not having a three-figure score Down Under?]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/ashes-rooting-for-joe-root-can-england-batter-end-his-wait-for-a-ton-down-under/articleshow/123201773.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/ashes-rooting-for-joe-root-can-england-batter-end-his-wait-for-a-ton-down-under/articleshow/123201773.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 12:14:36 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>NITIN NAIK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="86670" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123201781,imgsize-86670.cms"/></item><item><title>Defence output soars: Annual production in FY25 hits Rs 1.5 lakh crore, says Rajnath</title><description><![CDATA[India's defence production has reached a record high of Rs 1,50,590 crore in FY 2024-25, marking an 18% increase from the previous year, according to Defence Minister Rajnath Singh. This represents a significant 90% surge since FY 2019-20. Singh attributed this growth to the collaborative efforts of the Department of Defence Production, DPSUs, public sector manufacturers, and the private industry.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/defence-output-soars-annual-production-in-fy25-hits-rs-1-5-lakh-crore-rajnath-singh-gives-details/articleshow/123201186.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/defence-output-soars-annual-production-in-fy25-hits-rs-1-5-lakh-crore-rajnath-singh-gives-details/articleshow/123201186.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 11:29:31 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1124236" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123201223,imgsize-1124236.cms"/></item><item><title>Make America Baked Again? Trump talks weed over dinner with donors</title><description><![CDATA[US President Trump has reignited discussions on federal marijuana restrictions, hinting at potential policy changes. During a recent gathering, he acknowledged the need to re-evaluate the existing regulations. This comes nearly a year after he initially suggested easing access to regulated cannabis and granting states greater autonomy. While some advisors see cannabis reform as a boost for the upcoming midterms, others caution against potential legal and moral repercussions.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/make-america-baked-again-trump-talks-weed-over-dinner-with-doners-hints-at-marijuana-move/articleshow/123200165.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/make-america-baked-again-trump-talks-weed-over-dinner-with-doners-hints-at-marijuana-move/articleshow/123200165.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 09:40:06 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="610812" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123200186,imgsize-610812.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[Samsung’s big Tesla order fuels recovery bets despite chip woes]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/samsungs-big-tesla-order-fuels-recovery-bets-despite-chip-woes-19645636.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[The Tesla deal is significant as it marks a shift for the ailing foundry business — from relying on captive internal orders to deeper external engagements, Citigroup analysts said in a report. A successful implementation would boost Samsung’s prospects for generating more external clients and validate its investment in a US plant.]]></description>

    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[Starbucks sales miss points to slow turnaround under new CEO Niccol]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/starbucks-sales-miss-points-to-slow-turnaround-under-new-ceo-niccol-19645617.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Starbucks is trying to stage a comeback after an uncharacteristic streak of same-store sales declines over the past year and a half. Chief Executive Officer Brian Niccol, who took the helm in September, is betting he can give the US business a jolt by cutting down wait times, revamping the menu and remodelling stores to bring back seating.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Wed, 30 Jul 2025 07:34:26 +0530]]></pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Juviraj Anchil</dc:creator>

    </item>
    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[Future Female Forward | Apollo HealthCo's Shobana Kamineni: 'We want a crackerjack, banging demerger']]></title>

      <description><![CDATA[Kamineni emphasised the company's trajectory, stating, "We want a crackerjack, banging demerger," and predicted that by the time Apollo HealthCo lists, its turnover will be "probably as much, if not more than the hospitals."]]></description>
